name: Ballard Power Systems
goal: Ballard Power Systems is a manufacturer of fuel cell power systems for stationary and mobility applications.  Our mission is to use our extensive fuel cell and systems know-how to profitably deliver innovative clean energy solutions to our customers.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives: FCH-JU programs and projects; DG Move and DG RTD clean transportation initiatives
